title: Hermecito
content:
Dear Philes and Philosophes of Type

My new design was released 8th April at myfonts.com. It is called Hermecito.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/artypes/hermecito/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121656/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/artypes/hermecito/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/artypes/hermecito/")  
There are two pdfs posted at the gallery [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/artypes/hermecito/gallery.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121656/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/artypes/hermecito/gallery.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/artypes/hermecito/gallery.html") – one is A4 and the other in US Letter format – containing much information and specimen text settings etc. I'm attaching the A4 brochure but, as the max. upload is 2mb, not the US letter.

Kindest regards  
Rafaeli

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121656im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Hermecito5_5304.png)
author: ARTypes
